title: Amazon launch new affordable Belei skincare brand
text:

You might want to change up your skincare routine this week, as Amazon has just launched its own line of skincare products in the UK.

The Swiss-made Belei range is free from parabens and includes something for every skin type, ranging from acne-prone to ageing.

There are 19 products to choose from and everything is formulated without animal-testing. Prices start at just £8 for a gentle cleansing milk.

Belei means "believe in beauty" and uses sought-after ingredients such as hyaluronic acid, vitamin E and charcoal.

Our favourite item from the line is the Deep Cleansing Charcoal Mask (£12), which contains activated charcoal to remove dirt from the pores and keep acne at bay.

Other simple yet effective products include a Dark Circle Softening Eye Cream (£18), made from an anti-ageing formula with vitamin C, and the Vitamin Booster Serum (£20).

The new skincare line joins Amazon's affordable makeup collection, Find Beauty , that consists of wonderfully cheap products like contouring kits and mascara.

See some of our top picks from the Belei range below.

Deep Cleansing Charcoal Mask, £12

Activated charcoal draws out dirt from the pores, leaving skin cleansed and clarified.

Buy it now at amazon.co.uk

Ultra Sensitive Gentle Cleansing Milk, £8

A cleansing milk that removes stubborn makeup yet is super gentle on skin? We're sold.

Buy it now at amazon.co.uk

Dark Circle Softening Eye Cream, £18

Keep ageing signs and dark circles at bay with this nourishing eye cream, which is formulated with vitamins C and E.

Buy it now at amazon.co.uk

Vitamin Booster Serum, £20

As winter settles in, our skin will be in need of some extra hydration.

This serum booster is specially designed to be used before your moisturiser, providing a tightening effect to protect the skin from premature ageing.

Buy it now at amazon.co.uk

Ultra Sensitive Anti-Ageing Day Moisturiser with SPF 15, £16

Created with sensitive skin types in mind, this fragrance-free moisturiser contains SPF-15 to fight off sun damage and early signs of ageing.

Buy it now at amazon.co.uk

description: The online giant have released a line of their first own-brand skincare products - and it's all completely cruelty-free
